title: Watercolor, "Artist's Studio in Berlin", 1860s
medium: Brush and gouache on white paper
provenance: Eugene V. Thaw Collection; Lestranger, Paris
description: This is a study in watercolor for an oil painting of the same room by the same artist. It is possible that the subject is the artist’s own studio, with his wife or another family member at the piano. Implements of the artist, plaster casts, an easel and paintings are seen. Decoration is limited to the red lace lambrequins at the windows.

exhibitions.title: House Proud: 19th Century Watercolor Interiors from the Thaw Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Watercolor, "Artist's Studio in Berlin", 1860s.
1860s. Brush and gouache on white paper. Thaw Collection. 2007-27-30.
